plot: A barbarian trained in the arts of war joins with thieves in a quest to solve the riddle of steel and find the sorcerer responsible for the genocide of his people in this faithful adaptation of Robert E. Howard's sword and sorcery adventures. This film briefly sparked a wave of fantasy films including the sequel, Conan the Destroyer, in the early 80s.

m.role: Walking Shirtless Scene: Since Conan becomes an adult, he looks like he did not own a single shirt. He wears chest armour late in the movie... the kind that is shaped like a muscled torso, and is pretty much the same colour as his skin, so he looks shirtless anyway.

f.role: Action Girl: Tamara, after gradual promotion from Distressed Damsel. Marique also qualifies.
Conan the Barbarian (2011). Marique, witch daughter with Wolverine Claws of Khalar Zym.
Daddy's Little Villain: Marique to Khalar Zym.

Conan the Barbarian (2011) has, toward the beginning, Conan and his crew rescuing a group of men and women from slavers, with the women uniformly being buxom and topless. They're collectively listed in the credits as "Topless Wenches".
Fanservice Extra: Conan and his crew rescue a group of men and women from slavers, with the women uniformly being buxom and topless. They're collectively listed in the credits as "Topless Wenches".

Pregnant Badass: Conan's mom. She gives him birth on a battle chariot, immediately after slaying one of her enemies, sword in hand, armoured and all. The Caesarean cut is done by the father with his sword, no less - so that a sword is the first thing seen by Conan outside of his mother's womb.

name: Conan the Barbarian
